name: fragmented
author: James Smith
description: Maps URL fragments to events and vice versa.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run browserify:example
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean && npm run babel-debug && npm run browserify:example-debug
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar 'index.js' './example/index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build'
scripts.watch-debug: npm run build-debug && chokidar 'index.js' './example/index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-debug'
